TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileResponseElement extends System.Web.Caching.ResponseElement

summary.span: 表示存储为文件的输出缓存项一部分。

span.span: Represents part of an output-cache entry, stored as a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的输出缓存项的正文部分 （而不是标头）。The class represents the body portion (instead of the header) of an output-cache entry. 将数据从对象可以存储为部分或全部文件。The data from a object can be stored as either part or all of a file. ASP.NET 和自定义输出缓存提供程序可以返回响应在多个部分中使用的任意组合对象。Both ASP.NET and custom output-cache providers can return a response in multiple parts, using any combination of objects. 例如，一个提供程序可以返回的响应分段为三个不同对象，且每个对象都可以在不同的物理文件中检索从偏移量。For example, a provider can return a response that is segmented into three different objects, and each object can be retrieved from an offset into a different physical file.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileResponseElement (string path, long offset, long length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, int64 offset, int64 length) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, offset As Long, length As Long)
public: FileResponseElement(System::String ^ path, long offset, long length);
new System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement : string * int64 * int64 -> System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement

span.span: The fully qualified path for the file.

param.name: offset
param.span: 文件中字符串开始的位置。

span.span: The position in the file where the string starts.

param.name: length
param.span: 数据的长度，该数据从 定义的文件中表示输出缓存数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: The length of the data, starting at the offset that represents the output-cache data in the file defined by .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单个文件中包含完整的输出缓存响应，一个提供程序初始化类通过使用偏移量为零，并且整个文件的大小相同的长度。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, and a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果仅属于一个文件中包含完整的输出缓存响应，一个提供程序初始化类通过使用输出缓存响应的开始位置的文件和存储在输出缓存响应的长度等于大小中的偏移量该文件。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts, and a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

.property instance int64 Length
Public ReadOnly Property Length As Long
public: property long Length { long get(); };
member this.Length : int64

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取数据的大小，该数据从包含 实例数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: Gets the size of the data, starting at the offset that contains the data for a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单个文件中包含完整的输出缓存响应，输出缓存提供程序初始化类使用的整个文件的大小相等的长度。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, an output cache provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果仅属于一个文件中包含完整的输出缓存响应，一个提供程序初始化类使用该文件中存储的输出缓存响应的长度等于大小。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

public: property long Offset { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取 实例数据在文件中的起始位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the file where the data from a instance starts.

value.span: 数据在文件中的起始点。

span.span: The starting point of the data in the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单个文件中包含完整的输出缓存响应，一个提供程序初始化通过使用偏移量为零，如果完整的输出缓存响应的类包含在唯一的文件部分，提供程序初始化类通过使用输出缓存响应的开始位置的文件中的偏移量。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts.
